display_long_description:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393687_512109028220024_8255635767100546886_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=MSjnDiLprt0Q7kNvwExHKJd&_nc_oc=AdkzCrg-U_rR6GEMiOY4AGnclP5tTRtl3Y-1dx6PCZUc2jKbboujyWXbEF6kuURExtQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=91B7cYyMQex7gW1Yxa5UBw&oh=00_AfKX8lh8pG0d5zJb646HVItU3-DQEx8b3spugWzjWO9GjA&oe=6843E436)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393292_972139874890841_7067035628286260950_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=xH4gRhRGgcgQ7kNvwEXDZOh&_nc_oc=AdmQ0Fb6v-3lHvyfwYCAglF2TFFEVTnuYygECdylZM0Qjy2DSb2UELzAG7C5RZTutEQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=91B7cYyMQex7gW1Yxa5UBw&oh=00_AfKNF2U7THRgON2rtHiYM1mZ0qVK26z09bBIvRlMKKlrOg&oe=6843F5E9)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473391906_1043942824415838_4920723583868365724_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cqtc9WPc6s8Q7kNvwHLKlGA&_nc_oc=AdnexQ0d7iqBPBxPygp6Cr_MqbhpAqmv7SFlsTr7_n0soRVukAsPplxcamNeFNcNKVE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=91B7cYyMQex7gW1Yxa5UBw&oh=00_AfIyIobORY50igPD_C6Ovg-aiTqXYr4lQeQshiI8UOA0Iw&oe=684405DD)
